title: Cyborg Command - Action Music Collection
description: Step into the next dimension of gaming audio with "Cyborg Command", an explosive collection of 8 high-paced action music tracks. Sculpted for the adrenaline-charged moments of gameplay, these tracks are the sonic embodiment of power and relentless drive.
longDescription:
Step into the next dimension of gaming audio with "Cyborg Command", an explosive collection of 8 high-paced action music tracks. Sculpted for the adrenaline-charged moments of gameplay, these tracks are the sonic embodiment of power, drama, and relentless drive.


Features:


Tailored Formats for Dynamic Integration:

Offering both looped and unlooped versions, each track seamlessly fits varying game sequences, whether it's an extended combat scenario or a swift, impactful scene transition.


Crafted for Gaming:

These tracks aren't mere music; they're gaming symphonies. Purposefully designed to resonate with the intensity of game battles, chases, and climaxes, they amplify player immersion to unprecedented levels.


Royalty-Free Empowerment:

One-time purchase, forever impact. Use "Cyborg Command" across multiple gaming projects without the stress of additional fees or royalties.


With "Cyborg Command" in your audio arsenal, your game won't just be played; it'll be felt. Perfect for game developers eager to elevate their projects' auditory experience and captivate players from the first note.


--


Contains 2 Bonus Tracks


--

--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
technicalDetails:
Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes)

Number of tracks: 10

Number of cues: 18

Minutes of audio provided: 22 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
